mapper.select:
select di.id ,di.dcs_certificate_code dcsCertificateCode ,di.dcs_code dcsCode ,di.dcs_cost dcs_cost ,di.dcs_inspection dcsInspection,di.dcs_Month dcsMonth, di.dcs_next_time dcsNextTime,di.dcs_result dcsResult,di.dcs_time dcsTime,di.dcs_unit dcsUnit, di.is_dcs_scene isDcsScene,di.other_cost otherCost ,di.type_code typeCode,di.type_id typeId from docimasy_info di
where di.dcs_certificate_code like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
order by di.dcs_time asc

select di.id ,di.dcs_certificate_code dcsCertificateCode ,di.dcs_code dcsCode ,di.dcs_cost dcs_cost ,di.dcs_inspection dcsInspection,di.dcs_Month dcsMonth, di.dcs_next_time dcsNextTime,di.dcs_result dcsResult,di.dcs_time dcsTime,di.dcs_unit dcsUnit, di.is_dcs_scene isDcsScene,di.other_cost otherCost ,di.type_code typeCode,di.type_id typeId from docimasy_info di where di.id = #{id}

select di.id ,di.dcs_certificate_code dcsCertificateCode, di.dcs_code dcsCode ,di.dcs_cost dcs_cost ,di.dcs_inspection dcsInspection,di.dcs_Month dcsMonth, di.dcs_next_time dcsNextTime,di.dcs_result dcsResult,di.dcs_time dcsTime,di.dcs_unit dcsUnit, di.is_dcs_scene isDcsScene,di.other_cost otherCost ,di.type_code typeCode,di.type_id typeId from docimasy_info di where di.type_id = #{typeID}
